mapper.select: SELECT menu.* , concat('/', lcase(file.FILE_TYPE), '/', file.FILE_NM) AS IMG_SRC FROM PRESCH_MENU menu LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO file ON menu.MENU_IMG_ID = file.FILE_ID AND file.FILE_TYPE = 'MENU' WHERE SCH_CD = #{schCd} AND MENU_DATE = #{menuDate} ORDER BY MENU_DATE, MENU_TYPE

SELECT menu.* , concat('/', lcase(file.FILE_TYPE), '/', file.FILE_NM) AS IMG_SRC FROM PRESCH_MENU menu LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO file ON menu.MENU_IMG_ID = file.FILE_ID AND file.FILE_TYPE = 'MENU' WHERE SCH_CD = #{schCd} AND MENU_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY MENU_DATE, MENU_TYPE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESCH_MENU (SCH_CD, MENU_DATE, MENU_TYPE, MENU_IMG_ID, MENU_CONTENT, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#{schCd}, #{menuDate}, #{menuType}, #{menuImgId}, #{menuContent}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
